message: Yippee it's been a long time coming. It has broke my heart to see the fallout of our mall, I remember when it was so beautiful and great stores. I would always see alot of people I know.

I agree with your opinion on Clinton, but not with Trump. Trump will wage war and also get the rich richer. It doesn't matter anyway, because our rights will be taken away and we won't have much to live for soon. I'd rather die fighting against this tyrannical and corrupt government who doesn't have the balls to tell the people the truth, that many of the """"conspiracies"""" are true. That officials are being sold out to the richest families in the world. It's the beginning of the end.
Mohsin Rasheed

Some of these responses are unbelievable. Michelle Obama tried to start a good thing to nourish your kids. She can't police what each district puts in their lunches. You are all at choice. If your kids won't eat what's served, let them learn some life skills - make their own lunches at home and quit complaining. Geez!
